TopicTitle: Station changing to Base every time I dock with it

Articles.Content: Hi all, just wondering if anyone else has a problem with stations constantly changing from "Station" designation to "Base" every time the dock with them or add new modules onto it. I only ask because I'm using the station and bases contracts pack, so every time my KSS changes to a base it then stops issuing contracts for me to service my station, until I go and change it's type back to a station again. Not a huge problem, but very annoying. Does anyone know of a way to lock it to one vessel type so it wont keep changing?
